I've been told by two sources that Mr Ian Edmondson has evidence himself that might implicate other senior people at the News of the World, so clearly this has opened a whole can of worms, he said. The new Met inquiry follows the resignation last week of Prime Minister David Cameron 's official spokesman Andy Coulson , who said the media storm surrounding ongoing hacking claims had distracted him from his work.

Andy Coulson confirmed his resignation in a statement on Friday, saying that the continued coverage of events during his time as the editor of "News of the World' had made it difficult for him to give the 110 per cent needed in this role ." I stand by what I've said about those events but when the spokesman needs a spokesman it"s time to move on," The Telegraph quoted him, as saying. Following

Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are "very routine" for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings. U.S. FDA and

Michael Vick was selected to start Sunday after leading the NFC with more than 1.5 million votes, far ahead of Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson , the NFC's second-leading vote-getter at 948,410.
